Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Susanne Ritscher				     ritscher@irt.de
Institut fuer Rundfunktechnik (IRT)		     phone: +49-89-32399-458
Floriansmuehlstr. 60, D-80939 Muenchen, Germany	     fax:   +49-89-32399-415
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test8"
	"Test8" means the 8th item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test8.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test8.ext	(encoded extension bitstream)
	test8_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test8_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test8_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test8_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test8_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)


Description:
	matrix					0
	extension				yes
	transmission channel allocation		yes
	phantom center				no
	prediction				no
	dynamic cross talk			yes
	sampling freq.				48K
	LFE					no
	multilingal				no
	ancillary data				no
	bitrate base stream			256kbps
	bitrate extension stream		256kbps
	configuration				3/2
